title: Half in the Bag: Ghostbusters: Afterlife (SPOILERS)
author: RedLetterMedia
description: Mike, Jay and Rich Evans talk about the third sequel to the classic perfect comedy film Ghostbusters. If at first you succeed, fail, fail, and fail again! But this one's got kids in it.

localize.title: ハーフインザバッグ ゴーストバスターズ アフターライフ (SPOILERS)
袋子里的一半。捉鬼敢死队》。来世》（SPOILERS）。
袋子裏的一半。捉鬼敢死隊》。來世》（SPOILERS）。
